definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: thing sodden or boiled, pottage; abs. ´[[נ]] Ge 25:29 + 4 t.; cstr. [[נְזִיד]] Ge 25:34; —a kind of boiled leguminous food, obj. of [[וַיׇּ֫זֶד]] Ge 25:29 (v. [[זוּד]]

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: ); defined v:Ge 25:34 as [[נְזִיד עֲדָשִׁים]] (v. [[עדשׁ]]); obj. of [[בַּשֵּׁל]] 2Ki 4:38; boiled in a [[סִיר]] v:2Ki 4:39 cf. v:2Ki 4:40; mentioned, appar. as a common food, Hag 2:12.
